# The all-in-one startup operating system
## Incorporation, compliance, bookkeeping, and taxes ‚Äì all in one place.
[Start my company](https://firstbase.io/<https:/onboarding.firstbase.io/start>)[Onboard my existing company](https://firstbase.io/<https:/app.firstbase.io/auth/sign-up>)
# 30,000+ companies started with Firstbase
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/609486d2fafa37698a57db5b/66fa6465e7ab03a7d68cea84_Outfound.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/609486d2fafa37698a57db5b/66fa64653725adb9694a532d_bloom.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/609486d2fafa37698a57db5b/66fc3285d9f8db7381328533_Plutocard.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/609486d2fafa37698a57db5b/66fc3285448339f149778cd3_Global.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/609486d2fafa37698a57db5b/66fc3286deb9cb7d71b77aa9_Lightspin.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/609486d2fafa37698a57db5b/66fc328683839f09239d787f_Tatum.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/609486d2fafa37698a57db5b/66fc3285e75d5f46e078883e_Veremark.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/609486d2fafa37698a57db5b/66fc32866e46b6f917aeddd7_Volopay.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/609486d2fafa37698a57db5b/66fc3285c10baed16836e677_Remotefirst.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/609486d2fafa37698a57db5b/66fc328560b428227afb7595_Helloclever.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/609486d2fafa37698a57db5b/66fc3285bddf5b4060b19ac3_Integrate.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/609486d2fafa37698a57db5b/66fc3285b2f14e023019516f_Power.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/609486d2fafa37698a57db5b/66fa64659c28d2f89c0414cf_sendcamp.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/609486d2fafa37698a57db5b/66fc3285a41047ee57ec6a25_Lucidity.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/609486d2fafa37698a57db5b/66fa64659a7b589739c14b50_Zilla.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/609486d2fafa37698a57db5b/66fa6465b662efe57530ec4f_Workweek.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/609486d2fafa37698a57db5b/66fa64659cea027ca8abc71f_Courtly.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/609486d2fafa37698a57db5b/66fa64650953cacf7e089b51_misfans.svg)

## Start and Grow
# Everything you need to start and run your business.
Explore StartExplore Firstbase OneNew
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/609486d2fafa37698a57db5b/66fa7457b22a4506a54a0f31_start-hero.png)
Form your LLC or C-Corp. No paperwork or legal headaches. Our platform automates the entire company formation process with compliance and 24/7 global customer support.
[Start my company](https://firstbase.io/<https:/onboarding.firstbase.io/start>)[Learn more](https://firstbase.io/</start>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/609486d2fafa37698a57db5b/66fc455486792451cf1c909d_FB1%20hero.png)
Firstbase One is a suite of tools that provides founders with everything they need to run their business, including accounting, registered agent services, a premium physical US address, and tax filing services.
[Learn more](https://firstbase.io/</one>)
## Explore
# One platform to launch, operate, and grow a startup.
[Start![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/609486d2fafa37698a57db5b/66fa8ba28523e1f5c41d7a9e_arrow-up-right.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/609486d2fafa37698a57db5b/66fa8d5f19d25eab3141c90c_Start-img.svg)Form your LLC or C-Corp. No paperwork or legal headaches. Our product automates the entire process.](https://firstbase.io/</start>)[Mailroom![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/609486d2fafa37698a57db5b/66fa8ba28523e1f5c41d7a9e_arrow-up-right.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/609486d2fafa37698a57db5b/66fc80ba30bfcfecea8e7392_Mailroom-img.png)Get a premium, physical US address. All your business mail in one place. Maintain privacy, without missing an important notice.](https://firstbase.io/</mailroom>)[Agent![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/609486d2fafa37698a57db5b/66fa8ba28523e1f5c41d7a9e_arrow-up-right.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/609486d2fafa37698a57db5b/66fa8d8fc96d051d18418a3c_Agent-img.svg)Stay compliant in every state. Registered agent, franchise tax, annual reports. Automated peace of mind everywhere you operate.](https://firstbase.io/</agent>)[Accounting![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/609486d2fafa37698a57db5b/66fa8ba28523e1f5c41d7a9e_arrow-up-right.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/609486d2fafa37698a57db5b/66fa8da4a8e854b52cfbf324_Accounting-img.png)**Get tax and investor ready financials.** Powerful accounting platform. Full-service accrual bookkeeping. Books closed on time, every time.](https://firstbase.io/</accounting>)[Tax filing![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/609486d2fafa37698a57db5b/66fa8ba28523e1f5c41d7a9e_arrow-up-right.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/609486d2fafa37698a57db5b/66fc5be6f4f83ed0e8125c72_Tax-spot.png)**File your taxes with ease.** C-Corp or LLC**.** US-based or international founders. Corporate and personal returns ‚Äì we‚Äôve got you covered.](https://firstbase.io/</tax-filing>)[Payroll tax registration![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/609486d2fafa37698a57db5b/66fa8ba28523e1f5c41d7a9e_arrow-up-right.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/609486d2fafa37698a57db5b/66fc46ca1c9cad041d323a30_Payroll-spot.png)Hire from all 50 states.  State and city level payroll registrations. Withholding and unemployment accounts anywhere you hire. Forget outrageous EOR fees.](https://firstbase.io/</payroll>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/609486d2fafa37698a57db5b/66fa9464b81e0f45f9219948_Group%201155152.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/609486d2fafa37698a57db5b/66fa9477d6953e33cb026b78_Firstbase%20One.svg)
New
# All the power of Firstbase, one package.
Save $1,950
[Learn more](https://firstbase.io/</one>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/609486d2fafa37698a57db5b/66fa9626dbdfe5f679f0ba87_tag.svg)Start add-on](https://firstbase.io/<#>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/609486d2fafa37698a57db5b/66fc3cf2cbbff6ebbbfabae2_Mailroom-sm-trans.png)
Mailroom Premium
Secure a premium physical address and virtual mailbox
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/609486d2fafa37698a57db5b/66fc3cbb31d6be1d67aaa764_Agent-sm-trans.png)
Agent Autopilot
Get compliance reminders and annual report filings
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/609486d2fafa37698a57db5b/66fc3cba576c1fa45299d717_Accounting-sm-trans.png)
Accounting
Manage all your transactions in a unified dashboard
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/609486d2fafa37698a57db5b/66fc3cba8f4d59388b5900d8_Tax-trans-sm.png)
Tax Filing
Easily file state and federal taxes for your LLC or C-Corp
## Faster with Firstbase
# Starting a company should be a celebration, not a nightmare.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/609486d2fafa37698a57db5b/66fa9ac8749686ab0cb4f6ff_Frame%201156672.svg)
All-in-one platform.
Why manage eight different tools when you can have everything in one place.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/609486d2fafa37698a57db5b/66fa9ad7569966eff200a3a1_arrow-refresh-01.svg)
**Save time & money with automation.**
Faster and more accurate than traditional services.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/609486d2fafa37698a57db5b/66fa9b4b6771deffdfa219fe_globe.png)
**Global support from real humans.**
Trusted by founders in 188 countries.
## Rewards and Perks
# Get access to $350,000 in perks from our world-class partners and integrations.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/609486d2fafa37698a57db5b/66fa9c446771deffdfa2e0fc_Frame%201156601.png)
Banking
Quickly get approved for a US bank account through our banking marketplace.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/609486d2fafa37698a57db5b/66fa9d5b4afe99393d15622d_Frame%201156602.png)
Payments
No Stripe processing fee for your first $20,000 in transactions.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/609486d2fafa37698a57db5b/66fa9d72c2a234fe48b922f6_Frame%201156603.png)
Equity
Create a captable in Carta in one click after assigning equity using Firstbase‚Äôs post-formation toolkit. File 83(B) for free and on time.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/609486d2fafa37698a57db5b/66fa9d80ed96045510addd7a_Frame%201156604.png)
Legal
Get up to $6,000 worth of credits from world-class law firms.
![Carta Logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/609486d2fafa37698a57db5b/63114939e2519fd73295fb87_CartaLogo_White.svg)
"I'm excited to be a part of Firstbase‚Äôs journey as they democratize access to starting companies by making it accessible to everyone."
![Henry Ward, CEO of Carta.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/609486d2fafa37698a57db5b/620aa33eb9a5ab4dd454e4d6_henry-ward.jpg)
### Henry Ward
CEO
![Statuspage logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/609486d2fafa37698a57db5b/622a1d6a14193828db36291f_firstbase-statuspage.svg)
"Deciding to launch your own startup is hard enough. Firstbase takes what is often a big headache of incorporation for founders and simplifies the process into an efficient, personalized one stop shop."
![Danny Olinsky - Co-founder at StatusPage](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/609486d2fafa37698a57db5b/60d4b291dd72bbd0060627f6_firstbase-dannyolinsky.jpg)
### Danny Olinsky
Co-founder
![Y Combinator logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/609486d2fafa37698a57db5b/62327db150cb3a853452cc87_firstbase-yc.svg)
"We‚Äôre thrilled to support Firstbase‚Äôs mission and believe they will have a massive impact on new businesses being started around the world.‚Äù
![Jared Friedman - Partner at Y Combinator](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/609486d2fafa37698a57db5b/60ede2383f0c8b2662d6b660_firstbase-jared.jpg)
### Jared Friedman
Partner
![Logo of Calm Company Fund.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/609486d2fafa37698a57db5b/6109a0f94432c8ea6a50a72b_firstbase-calmfund.svg)
"Firstbase is tackling a big problem involving multiple government bureaucracies and this kind of relentless focus on the details is the only way to make launching a business truly seamless."
![Tyler Tringas - General Partner at Earnest Capital](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/609486d2fafa37698a57db5b/60eda4dcad74a0b2ee300e9d_firstbase-tyler.jpg)
### Tyler Tringas
Founder

generated_description:
**Firstbase.io: Your All-in-One Startup Operating System**

Founded in 2019 during the Y Combinator Batch W21, Firstbase.io is based in New York and has quickly established itself as a key player in the startup ecosystem. With a team of 50 dedicated employees, Firstbase.io integrates essential startup services‚Äîincorporation, compliance, bookkeeping, and taxes‚Äîinto a single, seamless platform.

### Mission
At its core, Firstbase.io aims to provide an **all-in-one startup operating system** for entrepreneurs. The mission is straightforward: simplify the complexities of starting and managing a business, so founders can focus on what really matters‚Äîgrowing their ideas.

### Services Offered
Firstbase.io offers a comprehensive range of services designed to support startups:
1. **Start**: Launch your company with ease.
2. **Agent**: Ensure compliance effortlessly.
3. **Mailroom**: Access a physical business address for your correspondence.
4. **Loop**: Gain one-click access to growth tools.
5. **Accounting**: Get tax-ready financials with integrated accounting services.
6. **Tax Filing**: File your taxes in minutes.
7. **Sales Tax**: Benefit from end-to-end sales tax compliance.

Their flagship product, **Firstbase One**, provides all these tools in one package, making it easier for startups to manage their operations without the hassle of juggling multiple solutions.

### Startups Supported
Firstbase.io has successfully assisted over **30,000 companies** across **191 countries**, empowering them to raise a staggering **$3 billion** in funding. Their diverse clientele reflects the platform's flexibility and effectiveness in various business environments.

### Partnerships and Community
Firstbase.io collaborates closely with industry partners to bring additional value to its users. They offer extensive resources, such as a **VC database**, compliance guides, and even tools for generating business ideas and names. This helps founders not just start their businesses but also thrive in the competitive landscape.

### Contact and Further Engagement
